get.description: This API fetches a single rule from your help desk layout.

delete.description: This API deletes a layout rule created for a field from a layout.

patch.description: This API updates the details of an existing layout rule in a particular layout.

get.description: This API lists all the rules configured for a layout.

parameters.name: activeRulesOnly
parameters.description: Get the rules that are active in the layout

schema.description: Get the rules that are active in the layout

post.description: This API creates a rule for a field in a layout.

get.description: This API gets the limitations count for Layout rules and validation rules.

get.summary: Get Layout Rules Count For Layout
get.description: This API gets layout rules count details for a layout.

parameters.name: layoutId
parameters.description: Get the rules of the layout

schema.description: Get the rules of the layout

post.description: This API disables execution of layout rules associated with a field in Help Centre. Only fields from tickets module are allowed to be passed as parameter to this API

get.description: This API lists all the rules configured for a department/layout.

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Get the rules of the department

schema.description: Get the rules of the department

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Name of the module for which you want to fetch the layout rules. Allowed values are tickets, contacts, accounts, tasks, timeEntry, contracts, products, calls, events

schema.description: Name of the module for which you want to fetch the layout rules. Allowed values are tickets, contacts, accounts, tasks, timeEntry, contracts, products, calls, events

parameters.name: activeRules
parameters.description: Get the rules that are active in the layout

schema.description: Get the rules that are active in the layout

searchString.name: searchString
searchString.description: Get the rules that have this search term

schema.description: Get the rules that have this search term

executeInHelpCentre.name: executeInHelpCentre
executeInHelpCentre.description: Get the rules that can be executed in help centre

schema.description: Get the rules that can be executed in help centre

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of rules to be fetched. Default is 50

schema.description: Number of rules to be fetched. Default is 50

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the rules must be fetched

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the rules must be fetched

layoutId.name: layoutId
layoutId.description: Get the rules of the layout

schema.description: Get the rules of the layout
